node.title: 'He died one night in the park on his own': Five deaths and a suicide should be sobering reminder of homelessness plight. But are we doing enough?
node.alt: A man in a green hoodie standing at a barricade with non-perishable food
node.description: A homeless service near the Queensland–New South Wales border says six local homeless people died this year, highlighting the dire lack of housing and support for those in need.
node.content:
["At least six homeless people who had been living near the Queensland\u2013New South Wales border\u00a0have died this year according to a local homeless service.", "Founder of You Have A Friend, John Lee, said he had heard the men and women were living between the Tweed and Coolangatta areas prior to the border being shut, and each had died from health-related reasons.", "He said they were in their 40s to 50s and suffered from issues with their mental health, physical health and other problems associated with living rough.", "\"We know of six, just in that Tweed\u2013Coolangatta area alone where we service,\" Mr Lee\u00a0said.", "\"Another, Richie \u2014\u00a0who I'd only recently spoken to \u2014\u00a0he died one night in the park on his own.", "\"Another besides Richie died on the streets \u2026 and one of the girls I knew had some problems with drugs and had gone to her mother to try and fix herself up and died there with her mother.\"", "", "
Goodwin Park Coolangatta was where a number of the region's homeless would sleep, particularly prior to the border being shut.(ABC Gold Coast, Tara Cassidy)
", "Mr Lee said the deaths highlighted the plight of homeless citizens and should be a sobering wake-up call for\u00a0local, state and federal governments to step up to provide adequate housing and other kinds of homeless support.", "He said homelessness did not discriminate, with many having families\u00a0and\u00a0various careers and backgrounds.", "\"For some it's years of drug and alcohol abuse, many died from health problems.", "Mr Lee said the lack of available and adequate housing was a factor.", "\"It's not good. There's nothing, no sort of support,\" he said.", "\"But Queensland doesn't want them. They're often told to get out of there, to go to New South Wales, 'we don't want you'.\"", "", "
John Lee said the death's highlight the need for more support and housing.(ABC Gold Coast, Tara Cassidy)
", "
Push for NSW program to be brought to Qld
", "Mr Lee said the Assertive Outreach program that operated\u00a0in some areas of New South Wales was some of the best action he had\u00a0seen in recent years that\u00a0addressed the problem.", "\"New South Wales is doing a very good job. Two to three years ago it was a very sad situation, some of the people in housing now would have waited 20 years for a house,\" he said.", "\"Many times I've found women in the Tweed areas sleeping in their cars and I'll ring Assertive Outreach up and within a few hours they've put them into a motel and into a unit.\"", "Mr Lee said he wished a similar approach would be adopted by Queensland, or other attempts to offer rounded support.", "\"Just getting them all and putting them all into a block of units doesn't work either, so [governments]\u00a0have moved away from that,\" he said.", "\"People are better scattered throughout various units with further support.", "\"I think that's a better system.\""]
